title: Big Barry White
content:
Thought it would be easy… I always think it will be easy…

Seems to be popular with CAD sign cutters - hoping it’s not a proprietary machine font.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BarryWhite.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604064908/http:/typophile.com/files/BarryWhite.jpg) | 53.57 KB |
author: Tommy

comments.content: I remember that from signmaking. The font is a standard Gerber Omega/Signmaker font called Caslon Adbold - sorry I cannot find a sample for you to compare, but I am certain of the name.

Many thanks evan! Found plenty of sources once I had the name.

Sample [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604064908/http:/lendaproducts.com/graphics/letstyle/page78.htm).

The old Fontbank font [CalentAd Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20060604064908/http:/www.buyfonts.com/value_for_money/calentad.htm) is a match for Caslon Ad Bold except for a few details (the ball serif on the ‘a’ is slightly cupped, for one).
